com.ausregistry.jtoolkit2.session

Interface SessionPoolProperties

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SessionManagerPropertiesImpl

    public interface SessionPoolProperties
    Configure the behaviour of a SessionPool. Sessions in the pool are configured from the SessionProperties extended by this.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getClientTimeout()
      Get the session idle time (in milliseconds) after which the keep-alive feature will allow sessions in the pool to be dropped (will no longer poll).
      int getMaximumPoolSize()
      Get the maximum number of sessions allowed in the pool.
      long getServerTimeout()
      Get the configured time interval (in milliseconds) after which the EPP server will close idle connections.
      long getWaitTimeout()
      The maximum time for configured objects to spend in wait() for any relevant condition, such as session acquisition or release.

    • Method Detail

      • getMaximumPoolSize

        int getMaximumPoolSize()
        Get the maximum number of sessions allowed in the pool.

      • getServerTimeout

        long getServerTimeout()
        Get the configured time interval (in milliseconds) after which the EPP server will close idle connections.

      • getWaitTimeout

        long getWaitTimeout()
        The maximum time for configured objects to spend in wait() for any relevant condition, such as session acquisition or release.

      • getClientTimeout

        long getClientTimeout()
        Get the session idle time (in milliseconds) after which the keep-alive feature will allow sessions in the pool to be dropped (will no longer poll).
